name: Chickens Please
description:
The Meats:

  • Hot dog
  • Burger
  • Chicken

How to play:

  • Click the window to open it and start seeing customers
  • Fill their order by dragging raw meat from ice chest to grill
  • When the thermometer fills up, the meat is cooked
  • Drag cooked meat to tray and click the bell to deliver order
  • If you deliver raw meat, you may be fined later
  • Meat left too long on the grill will burn
  • You don't get paid for incorrect orders
  • Try to fill as many orders as possible each day
  • Buy more meat for the next day
  • Try not to go bankrupt!
